name:
Ancestral Warrior Totem


Attack
requirements: Requires:   One Hand Mace, Two Hand Mace
description: Raises a Totem that uses socketed Mace skills.
explicit_mods: Totem base attack time is 1 second
Totem uses its own weapon, dealing 59 to 89 Base Physical Damage

name:
Arc


Spell
description: An arc of lightning stretches from the caster to a targeted enemy and Chains on to other nearby enemies.
explicit_mods: 50% more Damage for each remaining Chain

name:
Archmage


Buff
description: While active, causes your Spells to cost additional mana and deal extra Lightning damage, both based on your maximum Mana.
explicit_mods: Spells Gain 5% of damage as Lightning Damage for each 100 maximum Mana you have
Spells cost an additional 5.35% of your maximum Mana

name:
Armour Breaker


Attack
requirements: Requires:   Two Hand Mace, One Hand Mace
description: Attack with a forceful blow, knocking enemies back and weakening their armour.

name:
Armour Piercing Rounds


Ammunition
description: Load your Crossbow with a clip of bolts that can be fired rapidly and Break enemy Armour. Using this skill again reloads the clip.

name:
Ball Lightning


Spell
description: Fires a slow-moving Projectile that repeatedly shoots bolts of Lightning at nearby enemies.
explicit_mods: Hits enemies in range every 0.2 seconds
Fires Beams at targets within 1.8 metres

name:
Barrage


Spell
description: Ready a volley of arrows, Empowerinig your next Bow Attack to repeat multiple times. Consumes your Frenzy Charges on use to add additional repeats.
explicit_mods: Buff Empowers your next Bow Attack to Repeat an Additional time, plus an additional time per Frenzy Charge consumed
1440% of repeated Skill's Attack time is added to this skill's cooldown, to a maximum of 30 seconds

name:
Bind Spectre


Minion
description: Captures the spirit of a defeated monster, allowing you to summon it as a Minion.

name:
Blazing Lance


Attack
explicit_mods: Deals 158 Base Fire Damage per second
Converts 50% of Physical Damage to Fire Damage

name:
Bone Cage


Spell
description: Raises a ring of bone spikes around you. The spikes explode when an enemy touches them, damaging and Pinning bearby enemies.
explicit_mods: Pins enemies as though dealing 50% more Damage

name:
Bone Offering


Minion
description: Impales a Skeleton on a bone spike to shield your Minions while the spike remains. The shield absorbs all damage from the next Hit each Minion takes, then explodes. The bone spike itself a Minion, and shields itself if it dies, shields on your other Minions disappear.

name:
Boneshatter


Attack
requirements: Requires:   Two Hand Mace, One Hand Mace
description: Attacks enemies with a melee Strike. The Strike will cause a Heavy Stun on enemies that are Primed for Stun. Upon causing a Heavy Stun it will also create a Shockwave, dealing a large amount of damage in an area.

name:
Bonestorm


Spell
description: Channel to conjure a swarm of bone spikes in the air, then release to fire them at enemies. Shrapnel lodges in enemies hit, causing Attacks against them to  deal additional damage. Consumes your Power Charges to cause the spikes to cause much larger explosions.
explicit_mods: Debuff enemies take 16 to 25 additional Physical damage from next Attack

name:
Bow Shot


Attack
description: Fire an arrow with your Bow.

name:
Cast on Melee Kill


Trigger
description: While active, gains energy when you kill enemies with melee attacks and triggers socketed spells on reaching maximum energy.
explicit_mods: Gains 30 Energy when you Kill an Enemy with a Melee Hit
Triggers all Socketed Spells and loses all Energy on reaching maximum Energy
Has 10 maximum Energy per 0.1 seconds of base cast time of Socketed Spells

name:
Cast on Melee Stun


Meta
description: Cast on Melee Stun gains energy when you stun enemies with melee attacks. On reaching maximum energy, trigger all socketed spells.
explicit_mods: Gains 10 Energy per Enemy Power when you Heavily Stun an Enemy with a Melee Hit
Gains 2 Energy per Enemy Power when you Stun an Enemy with a Melee Hit
Triggers all Socketed Spells and loses all Energy on reaching maximum Energy
Has 10 maximum Energy per 0.1 seconds of base cast time of Socketed Spells

name:
Cast while Channelling


Trigger
description: Cast while Channelling gains energy while you channel. On reaching maximum energy, Trigger all socketed spells.
explicit_mods: Gains 60 Energy per second while you are Channelling
Loses 25 Energy per second while you are not Channelling
Loses all Energy when Reservation becomes inactive
Triggers all Socketed Spells and loses all Energy on reaching maximum Energy
Has 10 maximum Energy per 0.1 seconds of base cast time of Socketed Spells

name:
Charged Staff


Spell
description: Consume all Power Charges to infuse your Quarterstaff with electricity for a duration, adding Lightning damage and a Lightning shockwave to your Quarterstaff Attacks. Reusing the skill while the buff is active grants additional duration and damage up to a cap.

name:
Cluster Grenade


Attack
description: Fire a bouncing grenade that explodes when its fuse expires, throwing out a nova of smaller grenades that also explode after a further duration.
explicit_mods: Converts 20% of Physical Damage to Fire Damage

name:
Cold Snap


Spell
description: Shatters a Frozen enemy dealing a large amount of Cold Damage in a small area. Can be used on a Frostbolt to detonate it causing Cold Snap to trigger on all Frozen enemies near it.

name:
Comet


Spell
description: Pull a massive icy chunk from the air, dealing high damage at the targeted location. Targeting close up will cause you to float back as you cast.

name:
Contagion


Spell
description: Afflicts a single enemy with a debuff that deals Chaos damage over time. If the enemy dies while affected by Contagion, it and all other Chaos damage over time debuffs spread to nearby enemies and refresh their durations. Reanimating or detonating a corpse affected by Contagion will cause the minion or explosion to spread Contagion on hit.
explicit_mods: Deals 1.8 base Chaos Damage per second
Spell damage modifiers also apply to debuff Damage over Time
Increasing damage by 100% for each debuff transmitted, up to a maximum of 300%

name:
Dark Effigy


Spell
description: Raises a Totem that bombards enemies afflicated by Chaos damage over time Debuffs.

name:
Despair


Spell
description: Curses all targets in an area after a short delay, lowering their Chaos resistance.
explicit_mods: Cursed enemies have -32% to Chaos Resistance

name:
Detonate Dead


Spell
description: Causes a Corpse to violently explode, damaging surrounding enemies.
explicit_mods: Deals Physical Damage equal to 20% of Corpse's maximum Life

name:
Detonating Arrow


Attack
description: Channel to build up power before firing off a burning arrow. The arrow will detonate on impact at maximum charge, causing an explosion in an area around it.
explicit_mods: Gain 120% of Damage as Extra Fire Damage per Stage

name:
Discipline


Buff
description: Emits an Aura that grants Allies in your Presence Energy Shield based on your Mana. The Aura does not affect you.

name:
Earthquake


Attack
requirements: Requires:   Two Hand Mace, One Hand Mace

explicit_mods: Jagged Ground you create has 100% increased Effect

name:
Earthshatter


Attack
requirements: Requires:   Two Hand Mace, One Hand Mace

explicit_mods: Deals Damage along the fissure's Path and in a 1 metre radius around the emerging spike

name:
Electrocuting Arrow


Attack
description: Leap foward into the air and fire downard. Hitting an enemy will attach an Electrocuting Rod to them, causing all incoming Lightning damage to apply Electrocution. This rod is removed when the enemy is next Electrocuted.

name:
Ember Fusillade


Spell
description: Conjures a blazing Ember that hovers above you. After a short duration, the Ember launches at an enemy, dealing Fire damage in an area on impact. Recasting this spell resets the duration for all active Embers. Multiple Embers fired in the same Fusillade will attempt to target different enemies.
explicit_mods: Embers deal 4% more damage for each previous Ember fired in sequence

name:
Enfeeble


Spell

Eye of Winter


Spell

The Eye constantly releases damaging shard Projectiles in a spiral as it flies, plus an extra burst of shards at the end of its flight. If the Eye passes over an Elemental Ground Effect, it will take on that effect, applying it to nearby enemies and causing shards to deal more damage of the corresponding type.

Modifiers to number of Projectiles only apply to the final Spiral

name:
Falling Thunder

description: Infuse a staff with electrical energies, then slam the ground to deal damage in a large area in front of you. Consumes any Power Charges you have to fire lightning projectiles fowards from the impact.

100% more Damage if a Power Charge was Consumed

Attack
properties: Totem, Melee, Slam, Physical, Duration, Nova
description: Raises a Totem that Slams the ground around it, repeatedly damaging nearby enemies. Earthquake's Jagged Ground erupts when in this Slam.
explicit_mods: Totem base attack time is 3 seconds
Totem deals 5 to 8 base Physical Damage

name:
Sigil of Power


Spell
description: Places a Sigil on the ground, providing a powerful Spell Damage Buff to you and Allies while standing in it. The Buff becomes more powerful the more mana you spend while standing in the Sigil.
explicit_mods: Gains a Stage when you Spend a total of 50% of your Maximum Mana while in Area
Buff grants 14% more Spell Damage per stage

name:
Siphoning Strike


Attack
description: Dash to a target and Strike them with your Quarterstaff. If the target is Shocked, comsumes the Shock to release a Lightning shockwave around the target and grant you a Power Charge.

name:
Skeletal Arsonist


Minion
description: Summons bomb throwing, Reviving Skeletal Arsonists that can detonate other Minions on command.
explicit_mods: Deals additional Fire Damage equal to 15% of Minion's maximum Life

name:
Skeletal Brute


Minion
description: Summons hard hitting, Reviving Skeletal Brutes that can Stun Primed enemies.

name:
Skeletal Cleric


Minion
description: Summons Reviving Skeletal Clerics that heal other minions and revive fallen Skeletons.
explicit_mods: Minions from this skill have +12% to all Elemental Resistances

name:
Skeletal Frost Mage


Minion
description: Summons Reviving Skeletal Frost Mages that can Freeze themselves on command to slow nearby enemies.

name:
Skeletal Reaver


Minion
description: Summons aggressive, Reviving Skeletal Reavers that can enrage on command.

name:
Skeletal Sniper


Minion
description: Summons long ranged, Reviving Skeletal Snipers that can fire a gas arrow on command.

name:
Skeletal Storm Mage


Minion
description: Summons Reviving Skeletal Storm Mages that can call down a lightning storm on dead Skeletons on command.

name:
Skeletal Warrior


Minion
description: Summons Reviving Skeletal Warriors.

name:
Snipe


Attack
description: Channel to charge up your bow before releasing a powerful shot. Releasing the moment you fully charge causes the arrow to explode on impact for a guaranteed critical Hit.

name:
Sniper's Mark


Spell
description: Marks a target. The next Critical Hit the target receives consumes the Mark to deal extra damage and grant you a Frenzy Charge.
explicit_mods: Next Critical Hit against Marked Enemy has +38% to Critical Damage Bonus

name:
Solar Orb


Spell
description: Creates a stationary fiery Orb that periodically releases an explosion dealing Fire Damage. Casting this skill again will replace the previous Orb. Enemies that are very close to the Orb will take Burning damage.
explicit_mods: Deal 4.5 Base Fire Damage per second

name:
Sorcery Ward


Spell
description: Creates a protective barrier which takes Elemental Damage from Hits for you until depleted. The barrier will be restored to its full value after a short delay if you stop taking Elemental Damage from Hits, or if depleted.
explicit_mods: You cannot Cast this Spell directly
Elemental Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Elemental Damage up to 30% of your Armour and Evasion Rating
This Spell is Triggered when gained

name:
Spark


Spell
description: Launches a spray of sparking Projectiles that travel erratically along the ground until they hit an enemy or expire.

name:
Spearfield


Attack
description: Stab the ground causing multiple spears to burstot of the ground in front of you in a large area. The spears remain for a duration, or explode when enemies touch them.
explicit_mods: Creates 1 Spear per 0.1 metres of Radius
Maximum of 70 Spears at a time

name:
Staggering Palm


Attack
description: Dash to an enemy and strike them with an unarmed Attack. Heavy Stunning an enemy grants you a Buff that causes your Quarterstaff and Unarmed Attacks to also fire Projectiles for a short duration. This skill is always performed Unarmed even if you have a Quarterstaff equipped.

name:
Stampede


Attack
properties: AoE, Melee, Slam, Duration, Channeling, Travel
requirements: Requires:   One Hand Mace, Two Hand Mace
description: Charges forward, cracking the earth and leaving a patch of Jagged Ground with every footstep. At the end of your charge, a massive leaping Slam damages enemies and causes all patches of Jagged Ground to erupt in Aftershocks.
explicit_mods: Warcries can Empower this attack as though it was not Channelled

name:
Storm Spear


Attack
description: Throw a single copy of your spear. When it hits an enemy it bursts, firing bolts of lightning at multiple other enemies within a large area around it.
explicit_mods: Converts 60% of Physical Damage to Lightning Damage
Spear cannot Split, Pierce, Fork, Chain or Return
Modifiers to the number of Projectiles fired instead apply to the maximum number of Lightning Bolts fired

name:
Storm Wave


Attack
description: Sweep your Quarterstaff, projecting a bolt of Lightning through the ground in a long wave ahead of you
explicit_mods: Converts 80% of Physical Damage to Lightning Damage

name:
Stormblast Bolts


Ammunition
description: Loads your Crossbow with charged bolts that land around the target location and explode if hit by a Detonator Skill. Using this skill again reloads the clip.
explicit_mods: Converts 60% of Physical Damage to Lightning Damage

name:
Stormcaller Arrow


Attack
description: Fire an arrow that embeds where it lands. After a delay, the arrow will call down a lightning strike with a high Shock chance.
explicit_mods: Converts 20% of Physical Damage to Lightning Damage

name:
Summon Rhoa Mount


Spell
description: [DNT] Like a horse, but a bird. Apparently.

name:
Summon Wolf


Spell
description: Summons a wolf minion. Wolves howl when they first emerge, making critical hits more likely against nearby enemies.

name:
Sunder


Attack
requirements: Requires:   Two Hand Mace, One Hand Mace
description: Slams the ground, creating a wave of churning terrain that damages enemies in a sequence of areas in front of you. A number of enemies hit by the wave will release a shockwave, damaging other enemies.
explicit_mods: +0.2 metres to wave length for each wave in the Sequence
While Dual Wielding, both weapons hit with 30% less damage
Consumes Fully Broken Armour on enemies to guarentee a Critical Hit
Wave causes Shockwaves from up to 5 Enemies in each Area

name:
Supercharged Slam


Attack
description: Channel to charge up a heavy swing, drawing earth from the ground to enlarge your mace. Release to Slam the ground, dealing damage in an area around the impact, followed by Aftershocks dealing damage in a large area.
explicit_mods: Warcries can Empower this Attacks as though it was not Channelled
100% more Damage with Hits for each stage
Channelling ends 1 second after reaching maximum Stages
+5 to Radius per stage per previous Aftershock
100% more Damage with Hits for each stage

name:
Tempest Bell


Attack
description: Build Combo by successfully Striking Enemies with any skill. After building five stacks of Combo, create a Bell that can be Hit by your sklls, creating a damaging shockwave. Elemental Ailments applied to the Bell cause its shockwaves to deal extra damage of the corresponding type.
explicit_mods: Lose Combo if you generate no Combo for 8 seconds

name:
Tempest Flurry


Attack
description: Perform a series of aggressive strikes, ending with a powerful Shocking blow.
explicit_mods: Converts 60% of Physical Damage to Lightning Damage

name:
Temporal Chains


Spell
description: Curses all enemies in an area, lowering their Action Speed and making other effects on them expire more slowly.
explicit_mods: effects on Cursed enemies expire 25% slower

name:
Tornado Shot


Attack
description: Fires a skyward shot that whips up a Tornado where it lands, dealing Physical damage over time and Hindering enemies standing in it. Attack Projectiles you fire at the Tornado are sucked into, causing the Tornado to spit out a nova of matching Projectiles.

name: Tornado
description: Creates a Tornado that chases enemies for a duration, while hindering and repeatedly damaging enemies around it.

name:
Toxic Growth


Attack
description: Leap into the air and fire a volley of arrows which cause toxic pustules to sprout from the ground on impact. The pustules explode after a delay and can be Poisoned, causing them to explode faster and more violently.
explicit_mods: Stored poison adds up to 1 metre to base explosion radius
Stored poison grants up to 100% more explosion Damage

name:
Unearth


Spell
description: Raises spikes of bone from earth in front of you, damaging enemies. The bones of Corpses in the area are ripped out and reassembled into short lived bone construct Minions that fight for you.

name:
Vaulting Impact


Attack
description: Leaps forward and Slams the ground, sending out a Stunning shockwave that is especially potent against Dazed enemies.
explicit_mods: Consume Daze on Enemies to cause 300% more Stun buildup

name:
Vine Arrow


Attack
description: Fire an arrow into the air that lands after a short delay, causing a plant to spring up at the impact location. The plant sprouts vines that latch onto nearby enemies, Slowing their movement speed and dealing Chaos damage over time.

name:
Volcanic Fissure


Attack
requirements: Requires:   Two Hand Mace, One Hand Mace
description: Slam the ground, creating a winding fissure that deals area damage while travelling outwards then persists fro a duration. Slamming a fissure with a different Slam skill will cause it and all connected fissures to trigger Aftershocks.

name: Volcano
description: Create a volcano that fires projectiles around it. Channelling the skill causes it to fire more projectiles and deal more damage when it first erupts. Any Slam near the volcano causes it to erupt, firing projectiles.

name:
Voltaic Mark


Spell
properties: Attack, AoE, Mark, Lightning, Duration, Nova
description: Marks a target, making them more susceptible to being Shocked. W the Marked target dies, a Lightning nove erupts from their corpse. nova does not use your Weapon Damage, and instead uses its own Attack Damage.
explicit_mods: Hits against Marked enemy have 50% increased chance to Shock
Shock inflicted on Marked enemy has 30% increased effect

name:
Vulnerability


Spell
description: Curses all targets in an area after a short delay, reducing their Armour.

name:
Wave of Frost


Attack
description: Flip backwards while sending a freezing wave of ice to damage an area in front of you.
explicit_mods: Converts 80% of Physical Damage to Cold Damage
Hits Freeze as though dealing 350% more Damage

name:
Whirling Assault


Attack
description: Advance while hitting enemies around you with a series of spinning strikes.

name:
Whirling Slash


Attack
description: Perform a circular slash that kicks up a spinning storm of wind and dust around you, slowing enemies and blinding them in its area of effect. LEaving the area unleashes the swirling storm, causing it to deal damage.
explicit_mods: Using this Attack again in the storm adds 1 Stage to the storm
Using this Attack again in the storm adds 1 Stage to the storm
Damage from releading Storm has +4 to radius per Stage
Deals 150% more Damage per Stage when released
Enemies iniside the storm have 30% reduced Movement Speed
Storm gains +3 to radius per Stage

name:
Wind Blast


Attack
description: Strike enemies at range by generating a gust of wind as you swing. Enemies will be Knocked Back based on how close they are to you.
